entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
